concept.title: Messages
concept.shortdesc: Message descriptions are a particular kind of reference information. You can author them as reference topics.

conbody.p: Currently there is no separate information type to provide message-specific markup and no transforms to provide message-specific output and sorting.You can store all message entries in a single reference file, either as child topics, sections, or a set of <msgblock> elements in a single <section>. Authoring as separate reference topics makes it possible to manage links from message help to other kinds of information using maps.
Typically, message help should include a description of the symptom, the possible causes, and suggest recovery actions for the user.
